powergrid.control

Class PathFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.control.PathFinder

  • public class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with finding a path between two Points in the RSBot environment.

    It uses the A* algorithm on the map data collected by the mapper. Therefore, in order for the PathFinder to return the shortest known path, PowerWalk must be running and the environment surrounding the start and endpoints must be mapped.

    When calculating the path, various teleports and shortcuts are also used during calculation. The only teleports and shortcuts that are used are the ones the player has access to.

    • Method Detail

      • findPath

        public static java.util.List<Point> findPath(Point start,
                             Point end)
                                      throws OutOfReachException
        Finds a path between the given start and end using the A* algorithm.

        An ArrayList of the Points is returned that indicates a shortest path between the start and endpoint.

        The returned List is immutable.

        Parameters:
        start - the startPoint
        end - the endPoint
        Returns:
        a shortest path between the given start and endpoints.
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when no path exists between start and end
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the given start or endpoint is null

      • findPath

        public static java.util.List<Point> findPath(Point end)
                                      throws OutOfReachException
        Calculates and returns a shortest path from the player's current position to the given endpoint.

        This method is effectively the same as calling PathFinder.findPath(Bot.getBot().getPosition(),end).

        The returned List is immutable.

        Parameters:
        end - the Point to travel to
        Returns:
        a shortest path between the player's current position and the given endpoint.
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when no path exists between the player's current position and the given endpoint.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the given endpoint is null.

      • calculatePath

        public java.util.List<Point> calculatePath()
                                    throws OutOfReachException
        Calculates a path between start and goal using the A* algorithm.

        When this method has been called once, any consecutive calls to this method will return the same path.

        Returns:
        An immutable Path from start to goal
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - When no path between start and goal exists
